mapper.select:
select id as id, orderNo as orderNo, orderStatus as orderStatus, orderStatusDesc as orderStatusDesc, operationUId as operationUId, operationName as operationName, createdUserId as createdUserId, updatedUserId as updatedUserId, creatdTime as creatdTime, updatedTime as updatedTime, isDelete as isDelete from maintain_order_flow
and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into maintain_order_flow( orderNo, orderStatus, orderStatusDesc, operationUId, operationName, createdUserId, updatedUserId, creatdTime, updatedTime, isDelete) values( #{orderNo}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderStatusDesc}, #{operationUId}, #{operationName}, #{createdUserId}, #{updatedUserId}, #{creatdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{isDelete})
mapper.update:
update maintain_order_flow
orderNo=#{orderNo},
orderStatus=#{orderStatus},
orderStatusDesc=#{orderStatusDesc},
operationUId=#{operationUId},
operationName=#{operationName},
createdUserId=#{createdUserId},
updatedUserId=#{updatedUserId},
creatdTime=#{creatdTime},
updatedTime=#{updatedTime},
isDelete=#{isDelete}
